About Me

My Name is Sarah McDonald

Some people call me Sweetpotato, you can too.

I've done stuff: dogsledded in Minnesota, roadtripped across the country, traveled to 8 countries on 3 continents, graduated from culinary school with a degree in Baking and Pastry Arts, and moved from small town Missouri to NYC. But the really interesting stuff didn't happen until last year. In the past year, I've discovered coding, taken General Assembly's Web Development Immersive Program, and continued pushing myself to learn new technologies.

My Face Looks Like This

What I'm Looking for

My Ideal Job

I'm excited that I've found a field that continues to interest me, challenge me, and grow with me. I'm looking for a company that will benefit from my thirst for knowledge and my growing skill set.

Expectations

  • By the end of my first day I'd like to have my dev environment setup and understand most of the dependencies

    Projects

    Over the Shoulder Reviews

    A static page blog with book reviews based on what I'm able to read over the shoulders of commuters on the New York City subway. Built on Jekyll and hosted on Github pages.

    TasteBuds

    TasteBuds is a platform for proclaiming what you consider to be the best food establishment for a given category in New York City. Built using MEANstack, Foursquare API, MapBox and hosted on Heroku.
